definition[0]: (1944–)  a British model who, along with her friend Christine Keeler, is known for being involved in the Profumo Scandal in 1963. During the trial about the affair, she said that she had had a sexual relationship with an English lord. She was told that the lord had said this was not true, and she became famous for her reply when she said ‘He would say that, wouldn’t he?’.
